quote.summary: Plus Group Holdings Inc is a China-based company principally engaged in the provision of sales and marketing services. The Company mainly provides on-site sales and marketing solutions for leading FMCG (fast moving consumer goods) brands and distributors that conduct business in offline retail stores (such as supermarkets, department stores, outdoor promotions, and others.). The Company provides four main categories of services. The customized marketing solutions mainly include the implementation of customized sales and marketing plans aimed at increasing brand awareness, promoting merchandise and moving sales. The tasks and marketers matching service mainly include the implementation of standardized sales and marketing activities aimed at improving the sales performance of our clients. The marketers assignment service mainly includes assigning employee marketing personnel to perform sales and marketing duties at designated offline retail stores according to the instructions of customers, and helping to manage the human resources-related administrative affairs of such employee marketing personnel. The SaaS+ subscription mainly includes customization and subscription of ready-made digital tools.
